description: Stark is known for is immense strenght, which he often strugles to control due to his timid nature. Despite this, he is fiercly loyal to his companions and is willing to put himself into harm's way to protect them. When he overcomes his fear he will fully embrace his strenght and pontential. Hitting his enemys where it hurts.
taunt_1: If i lost my nerve here, i'd never be able to face my master again. Let's go!
taunt_2: I have a title to uphold. People to protect.
taunt_4: All i have to do is steel my resolve.
anger_1: What a waste. It's no big surproise. The town's stuck on the defences.
anger_2: Hey uh... is this realy necessary?
nervous_1: I'm Stark - the hero of this village. And it's my job to defend it.
nervous_2: Easy to say that now. But knowing myself. I'll run away.
victory_1: You know. now that i think about it. My masters blows were heavier than yours. You're just a poor imitation of a great warrior.
victory_2: You should have trained your brain as much as your body.
victory_3: When i saw how you fought i was prepared for us both to kill each other. But your attacks don't have any weight behind them..
victory_4: Now they are all smiles. They're convinced that as long as i'm aroundtheir home remains safe from another attack.
request: For you it'll be no issue, right?
ally_death: Don't hold back. You must be furious. I left without so much as a word.
congrats: I've had difficulties defeating it on my own
boast: I killed it? On my own. I didn't need any help. I beat the dragon.
help: I#m not keen on dying. But that's a minor thing.
extra: This scar on my forehead. I didn't get it taking on a monster. It's from a fight i had with my master.
siege: II want you to promise me one thing. If i die fighting this dragon. You have to finish it of for me.
no_attack_1: And - that realy has to be my job?
no_attack_2: We don't stand a chance against enemys like those.
no_help_1: We don't stand a chance in a fight against monsters like them.
no_help_2: My master always told me. That you made the heros adventure a ridiculous one.
no_sent: You got no reason to glare at me. I bought this with my own money.
sent: Fine. I guess you can have half.
team_winning: I guess your silliness made things fun.
team_losing: The only reason the dragon hasn't destroyed this place is because it hasn't felt like it.
will_attack: I don't mind joining your party.
